prompt: what is the relationship between Elsevier and Engineering Information Inc.
response:
Elsevier and Engineering Information Inc. (Ei) are closely related in that Elsevier owns Ei. Engineering Information Inc. is known for producing databases that index scientific and engineering literature, most notably "Ei Compendex," which is one of the most comprehensive engineering literature databases in the world.

Elsevier, a major international publisher specializing in scientific, technical, and medical content, acquired Engineering Information Inc. in the late 1990s. This acquisition allowed Elsevier to expand its portfolio of databases and services, further solidifying its position as a leading provider of research information and solutions to the scientific and engineering communities.

Through this relationship, Elsevier has been able to integrate Ei's comprehensive indexing with its own wide array of academic journals, books, and research tools, thereby enhancing the accessibility and visibility of engineering research.
